select t1.*,(select realname from sys_user where id= t1.end_user_id) as endUserName,concat(DATE_FORMAT(t1.start_time,'%H:%i'),"-",DATE_FORMAT(t1.end_time,'%H:%i'))as startEndTime from patrol_task t1 where t1.status not in (6,7,8) and t1.del_flag = 0
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{patrolTaskDTO.patrolDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.status = #{patrolTaskDTO.status}
AND t1.CODE IN ( SELECT t2.task_code FROM patrol_task_organization t2 WHERE t2.task_code = t1.CODE AND t2.org_code = #{patrolTaskDTO.orgCode})
AND t1.CODE IN (SELECT t3.task_code FROM patrol_task_station t3 WHERE t3.task_code = t1.CODE AND t3.station_code =#{patrolTaskDTO.stationCode})
order by t1.create_time desc

select t1.*,(select realname from sys_user where id= t1.end_user_id) as endUserName from patrol_task t1 where t1.status in (6,7) and t1.del_flag = 0
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{patrolTaskDTO.patrolDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.status = #{patrolTaskDTO.status}
order by t1.create_time desc
SELECT t2.depart_name FROM patrol_task_organization t1 LEFT JOIN sys_depart t2 ON t1.org_code = t2.org_code where t1.task_code = #{taskCode}
SELECT t2.line_code, t1.station_code FROM patrol_task_station t1 LEFT JOIN cs_station t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code WHERE t1.task_code = #{code}
select t2.user_name from patrol_task t1 left join patrol_task_user t2 on t1.code = t2.task_code where t2.task_code = #{code}
select t1.realname as realname, t1.id, t1.org_code from sys_user t1 where t1.org_code = #{code}

SELECT * FROM patrol_task pt WHERE pt.del_flag = 0
and pt.id = #{patrolTaskParam.id}

SELECT t1.* FROM patrol_task t1 where t1.source = 3 and t1.status in (0,3) and t1.discard_status = 0
and t1.code in(select t3.task_code from patrol_task_station t3 where t3.station_code = #{patrolTaskDTO.stationCode})
and t1.code in (SELECT t2.task_code FROM patrol_task_organization t2 where t2.org_code = #{patrolTaskDTO.orgCode})
and t1.name like concat('%',#{patrolTaskDTO.name},'%')
and t1.code like concat('%',#{patrolTaskDTO.code},'%')
and t1.status = #{patrolTaskDTO.status}
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) between DATE_FORMAT(#{patrolTaskDTO.dateScope}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{patrolTaskDTO.dateScope}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT cm.major_name FROM cs_major cm WHERE cm.del_flag = 0
AND cm.major_code = #{code}

SELECT cs.system_name FROM cs_subsystem cs WHERE cs.del_flag = 0
AND cs.system_code = #{code}
SELECT su.realname FROM sys_user su WHERE su.del_flag = 0 AND su.id = #{userId}
